CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 1, 1956, pg. 3, reads: "Treacherous Sidewalk - The above photo shows the exposed rim of a sidewalk manhole which tripped Mrs. Margaret Covington Pasker, resulting in a cut and swollen knee - also headaches from the fall. Mrs. Pasker was returning to her home at 2537 Webster Ave. on the afternoon of Aug. 24 when her foot was caught in 'sidewalk trap' on Webster Ave., near Junilla St. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Manhole cover inscribed "DPW METER" on broken sidewalk of herringbone patterned bricks, Webster Avenue near Junilla Street, Hill District, another version
